achievements.name: Escape the Taken to the motel.
achievements.description: You reached the relative safety of the motel.

achievements.name: Rewrite reality for the first time.
achievements.description: You rewrote reality and brought down the satellite.

achievements.name: Make sure Dr. Meadows can take another look at the skies.
achievements.description: You secured the coolant tanks at the observatory.

achievements.name: Rewrite reality for the last time.
achievements.description: You used Mr. Scratchâ€™s own trap to destroy him.

achievements.name: Survive until dawn in any Arcade Mode level.
achievements.description: You made it through the night and enjoyed a nice sunrise in one of the Arcade levels.

achievements.name: Get a six-minute survivor streak and over 100,000 points in an Arcade level.
achievements.description: You got a six-minute survivor streak and over 100,000 points in an Arcade level.

achievements.name: Unlock all of the Nightmare Arcade Mode levels.
achievements.description: You have unlocked all of the Nightmare Arcade Mode levels.

achievements.name: Survive an Arcade level using nothing but the flashlight and handheld flares.
achievements.description: You survived an Arcade level using nothing but the flashlight and handheld flares.

achievements.name: Get 70,000 points in any Nightmare Arcade level.
achievements.description: You got 70,000 points in a Nightmare Arcade level.

achievements.name: Take out two Splitter spawns with a single shot.
achievements.description: You took out two Splitter spawns with a single shot.

achievements.name: Find all of the manuscript pages.
achievements.description: You got every manuscript page in the game.
